add.heading: Enter personal informations
add.existing_pat: If you are already a patient in our practice bot don't have an account, check here.
add.new_pat: If you are new to our practice, please check here and fill out all required fields
add.privacy_body: We will use your details exclusively to create your account, and to contact you in case we need to change an appointment. We shall never disclose any of your details to third parties, unless required to do so by legal enforcement authorities.
add.warn_dob: Please enter your birthdate (european form: d.m.y).
add.warn_mail: The mail address is required (it will be your login name).
add.warn_pwd: A password of at least 5 characters is required.
add.warn_pwd_rep: Please enter your password here again.
